author: GamingBolt
description:
Sony’s PlayStation 5 has been selling like hot cakes since it was released back in 2020. With a whopping 10 TFLOPs of raw compute, the PS5 is a gaming beast that has been producing some amazing visuals in current-gen releases, both first-party and third-party alike.

There’s always been this notion about a console being a much cheaper alternative than the PC in gaming circles, but exactly how big is that margin right now? To answer this question, we will try to build a PC that’s just as powerful as the PS5 in an effort to find that out.
title: How Much Would It Cost To Build A PC As Powerful As The PS5? (2025 Edition)

author: GamingBolt
description:
While the first half of 2025 has brought us video games that have been nothing short of stellar, there's a lot of promise in the lineup of upcoming games from various studios who are known to raise the bar with every new release that they bring to their audiences. Brand new titles and highly anticipated sequels are on the horizon!

We take a look at some of the games that hold a lot of promise, with many gamers waiting to pick up their controllers and dive into the explosive stories, gameplay loops, and unique mechanics they are primed to bring to the table. It's going to be a wild second half for the gaming world this year and we're with you every step of the way.
title: 20 BIG Games Still Coming Out In 2025 [FIRST HALF]
